content:
System.Data.Services.Design Namespace

Definition

Used by the code generation command line tools and tools in Visual Studio to generate strongly-typed client side objects for communicating with data services.

In this Article

Classes

EdmToObjectNamespaceMap

Used by the code generation command line tools and tools in Visual Studio to generate strongly typed client-side objects for communicating with data services.
EntityClassGenerator

Used by the code generation command line tools and tools in Visual Studio to generate strongly typed client-side objects for communicating with data services.
PropertyGeneratedEventArgs

Used by the code generation command line tools and tools in Visual Studio to generate strongly typed client-side objects for communicating with data services.
TypeGeneratedEventArgs

Used by the code generation command line tools and tools in Visual Studio to generate strongly typed client-side objects for communicating with data services.

Enums

DataServiceCodeVersion

Specifies the version of the Open Data Protocol (OData) targeted by the generated code.
LanguageOption

Used by the code generation command line tools and tools in Visual Studio to generate strongly typed client-side objects for communicating with data services.

Remarks

This class is not intended for public use.
